title: Update Expired Password
description: Update Expired Password. Used to change password of the profile, if current password is expired.

token.description: The token for the password reset.

login.description: Login of the user. This will be optional when the operation is validateToken.

password.description: The new password. This will be optional when the operation is validateToken.

confirmPassword.description: Confirmation of the new password. This should match the new password value. This will be optional when the operation is validateToken.

op.description: The operation to be performed. This is an optional parameter that can be set to validateToken to just validate the token.
